name: BowWars demo
description:
BowWars is a action, online FPS  game where you have a crossbow and have to fight off other players to score points by shooting the core!

This is a free demo of BowWars where you are in the training range.

Controls:

E = pick up crates

Left click = shoot

W,A,S,D = movement;

right click = scope

1,2,3,4 = arrow switch 

Space bar = Jump

BowWars discord server:

https://discord.gg/2vZZ5d66Uw

Patch notes:

0.1

-added ragdolls

-made movement and sensitivity feel better on web version

- added types of dummy targets(dummy, dummy god)

0.11

-updated lighting

-updated post processing

-added the ability to move crates with arrows by hitting the crates

-removed the ability to pick up dummy's and dummy gods
